alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 7:30PM MST until November 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times, with total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau above 7500 feet. This includes Buffalo Pass. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Poor travel conditions are expected due to slick roads and reduced visibility. Snow forecast from 11 AM Friday to 5 AM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 4 to 8 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
